pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Test and Change-Point Detection Algorithms Based on E-Values / E-Detectors // Algorithms of nonparametric sequential test and online change-point detection for streams of univariate (sub-)Gaussian, binary, and bounded random variables, introduced in following publications - Shin et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2203.03532, Shin et al. (2021) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2010.08082.
